c:complexType.name: FlattenedCartesianAxisOptions
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation class of the cartesian axis panel for discrete scale types, that presents multi-dimensional roles in a flattened form, by joining multiple values with a separator character.
For more information about cartesian axes please see the comments in the base class .

c:property.name: ticks
c:property.c:documentation: Indicates if ticks are shown for each category value.

c:property.name: extensionPoints
c:property.c:documentation: The extension points object contains style definitions for the marks of the panel.

c:complexType.name: FlattenedCartesianAxisExtensionPoints
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The extension points of the flattened discrete cartesian axis panel.
To use an extension point you must find its full name, by joining:
panel property name (ex: xAxis)
extension property (ex: label)
the "_" character
extension sub-property (ex: textStyle)
and obtaining, for the examples, the camel-cased name: xAxisLabel_textStyle (see ).
